title: Lise Devriyesi
overview: YİĞİT works as a police man he wants to show his boss that he is responsible and good at his job so his boss NECDET requires him an undercover mission at a high school to do so him and his two friends go and at the same time the bosses daughter IŞIL wants to be a police officer, then she finds out about the mission at school and she helps them and there the love between them begins.
